response_requirements.initial_response_description: 10 business days to disclose records that will be disclosed in their entirety. For partially public records: 10 business days to provide notice, then 5 business days to disclose public parts.
extension_conditions: Extenuating circumstances: Written acknowledgment within 10 business days, notice within 20 business days, then disclosure within 5 business days of notice
response_requirements.no_response_consequence: May appeal to Office of Information Practices or seek judicial review

fee_structure.notes: Agencies may charge reasonable fees for copying costs, staff time for extensive searches, and administrative costs.

exemptions.description: Records that would constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy
Social services or welfare benefits information
Records that would compromise ongoing legal proceedings
Records that would interfere with legitimate government functions

appeal_process.appeal_description: Individuals can appeal denials to the Office of Information Practices. Administrative appeal process available.

penalties.civil: Potential damages and attorney's fees for wrongful denials

requester_requirements.specific_format: Must be in writing with sufficient contact information and reasonable description of requested record. Requesters can typically remain anonymous.
requester_requirements.notes: No citizenship restrictions. No statement of purpose required. No restrictions on how public records can be used.

specific_obligations: Respond within 10 business days for full disclosures
Provide notice within 10 business days for partial disclosures
Disclose public parts within 5 business days of notice
Cannot be compelled to create new records

oversight_body.name: Office of Information Practices
oversight_body.role: Administers UIPA, handles appeals, provides guidance
oversight_body.contact_info: No. 1 Capitol District Building, 250 South Hotel Street, Suite 107, Honolulu, HI 96813. Phone: (808) 586-1400. Email: oip@hawaii.gov
enforcement_powers: Maintain oversight of nearly 7,000 government units

validation_metadata.verification_notes: Parsed from official statutory text file. Response time verified against canonical-values.json (10 business days). 9 exemptions parsed from statute.
